4. Scorer¶

class mcts.scorer.scorer.Scorer(alpha=0.5)[source]¶

Abstract class for the calculation of the score of a SMILES

reward(smiles, already)[source]¶

Method giving the reward depending on the score of the SMILES and if it have already been calculated

Parameters:
  • smiles – the SMILES to reward
  • already – True if the SMILES score have already been calculated
Returns:

the reward of the SMILES
score(smiles)[source]¶

Abstact method to calculate the score

Parameters:smiles – the SMILES object to score
Returns:the score of the SMILES
class mcts.scorer.scorer.ScorerDFT(alpha=0.5)[source]¶

Sub class of scorer Used to reward the DFT score of a SMILES

score(smiles)[source]¶

Score the SMILES

Parameters:smiles (SMILES) – SMILES to score
Returns:-100 if the SMILES is not valid, -0.5 if the DFT calcul didn’t end a value above 0 depending on the peak of oscillator strength otherwise
class mcts.scorer.scorer.ScorerValidSMILES(alpha=0.5)[source]¶

Sub class of Scorer Used to reward on the validity of the generated SMILES

score(smiles)[source]¶

Score the SMILES

Parameters:smiles – SMILES to score
Returns:1 if the SMILES if valid else -1
